observation: I can see a sign-up page with a country/region selector. The dropdown currently shows 'Select' as placeholder text. I can see a long list of countries in the dropdown that appears to be already opened, including Indonesia at element 183 which should be a good choice for this elderly user as it's likely not restricted. The Next button at element 439 is available but disabled until a country is selected.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I need to select a country from this dropdown. I can see Indonesia in the list which is typically accepted by financial platforms. I should click on Indonesia to select it as my residence.
ux_issues: The dropdown list is very long and may be overwhelming for elderly users
Small text size in country list may be difficult to read
No clear indication of which countries might be restricted

outcome.visual_observation: The dropdown menu selection changed from 'Select' to showing 'Select' again, but no country was actually selected. The UI remains in the same state with no progression in the sign-up flow.
outcome.diagnosis: The tap action on Indonesia country option did not register properly or the dropdown did not contain the Indonesia option, resulting in no selection being made
